entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 17
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS AROUND 50
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 19
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
LOWS 15 TO 20

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
